roleset.name: roll on the floor laughing

example.name: both args
example.text: Also ; *PRO* rofl at all the occupiers who are filming on their smartphones ; they do realise that buying them fed " the 1 % " ?
example.arg: at all the occupiers who are filming on their smartphones
